author: Reuters Editorial
title: NTSB says Autopilot engaged in 2018 California Tesla crash
description: "The National Transportation Safety Board said Tuesday a Tesla Model S was in Autopilot mode when it struck a fire truck in Culver City, California -- one of a series of crashes the board is investigating involving Tesla's driver assistance system."

title: Unemployment falls to post-crash low of 5.2%

content: "The States jobless rate fell to 5.2 per cent last month, according to the latest official figures. This was higher than previously reported on account of an upward revision by the Central Statistics Office (CSO), one of several in the last two years.\r\nNonethe… [+800 chars]"

title: North Korean footballer Han joins Italian giants Juventus
description: Han is the first North Korean player in the Serie A and was praised during his appearances during youth World Cups.
content: "Han Kwang Song, the first North Korean footballer to score in the Italian Serie A league, has joined reigning champions Juventus on loan from Cagliari.\r\nHan signed a one-year contract with the club with an option to buy after the year ends for five million eu… [+1240 chars]"

author: BBC News
title: UK government lawyer says proroguing parliament 'political not legal'
description: "The UK government's lawyer, David Johnston argued that proroguing parliament was a political decision for the government, rather than a legal matter for the court to decide."

author: The Associated Press
title: 'This Tender Land' is an affecting story about growing up
